title: DON BYAS / BUD POWELL / A Tribute to Cannonball (1961)/quintet
description:
Quintet tracks with Bud Powell in good form....there aren't enough of these!



Don Byas' idea was to translate Art Tatum to the saxophone.  The right hand

of course.  However, his linear construction was original.  The way he broke

up the lines he played was his way and his alone........H RENAUD





I just wish he could have treated Mary Lou with a bit more respect......fA
